resources.string: Truncate &column headers to maximum data size

&Open "Tables" folder in Object Browser as default
Automatically &refresh Table Data tab on focus
&Prompt if multiple rows are getting updated

Paste object name in &editor on double-click
Enable &word wrap in SQL editor and BLOB viewer
Force disable F&K check throughout HTTP import batch process
S&how suggestion as you type in SQL editor
Select the object(s) you want to delete from database

Get SQLyog ULTIMATE today to enable this and dozens of other great features.

Maxi&mum number of connections per hour
Note - Please select an object to GRANT/REVOKE privileges

Insert the clipboard content at the current insertion point
Create a valid SQL INSERT statement for the table
Select all text in the current window
Find the specified text and replace it with different text
Show or hide the object browser
Arrange the windows as overlapped window
Display the program information and copyright
Create schema for the database in HTML
Show or hide the result window
Make a copy of the selected table in the database
Reorder columns of the selected table

Show or hide the SQL editor
Manage jobs for SQLyog Job Agent
Manage Relationships For the Selected Table

Selecting [ALL] to sync all tables in the source database. You can select all columns or specific columns to be used for comparing data. You can also specify a where clause to filter rows that are being compared.
Select databases that you want to export
You can export ALL databases or SELECTED database.
Specify whether you want to generate dump in one single file or across multiple files in a directory

Drop the currently selected stored procedure
Alter view structure of the currently selected view
Create a new trigger on the currently selected table
Place the cursor on a specific line
Create a valid SQL SELECT Statement for the Table
Export table data as CSV/HTML/XML/SQL statements
Why upgrade to Professional/Enterprise/Ultimate? Scheduled Jobs allows you to schedule important jobs like backups, data sync, etc
No nag screens on startup and shutdown
Dozens of Power Tools for Smart MySQL Management included
Get one year of unlimited premier email support
Create schema visually using Visual Schema Designer
Create relationships using simple drag-n-drop interface
Reverse Engineer your database schema using Visual Schema Designer
Use Visual Schema designer to share schema design within a team
Print your database schema using Visual Schema Designer
Construct your queries visually using Visual Query Builder
Create SQL faster by using Visual Query Builder
Visually create SQL statements without the need to remember column names
Build complex queries using drag-n-drop interface
Write queries 10x faster using Smart Autocomplete
Smart Autocomplete has complete support for table and column aliases
Provides intelligent code completion for fast, accurate SQL
Smart Autocomplete provides keyword formatting and column picker
Smart Autocomplete dramatically reduce your time at the keyboard
Compare and synchronize MySQL database schemas
Save hours of tedious work and eliminate manual scripting errors
Take database snapshots and compare them dash; useful for audit trails
Generate schema change histories, ideal for database versioning
Apply schema changes from development MySQL to test MySQL to production MySQL
Schema Sync tool brings two or more schemas in complete sync
Compare the contents of two databases using Data Sync Tool
Automatically synchronize your data using Data Sync Tool
Data Sync allows you to take instant backups of your hosted MySQL data
Data Sync tool uses intelligent checksum based algorithm to detect changes
Data Sync tool helps you verify the success of your data migration
Data Sync tool helps you create an audit trail by comparing backups
Data Sync tool helps restore missing or damaged data at table, row or column level
Data Sync tool helps troubleshoot your replication issues
Use HTTP/SSH Tunneling to connect to MySQL even if direct connection is disallowed
HTTP/SSH Tunneling allows you to get rid of the annoying phpMyAdmin page refreshes
Import data directly from Excel, Access and CSV files
Import schema and data from any ODBC compliant data source
Import external data at scheduled intervals
Receive status updates over email for scheduled import of external data
Import external data containing hundreds of columns and millions of rows
Scheduled Backups presents a wizard driven interface to take backups
No need to learn cryptic command line tools for backups
Scheduled Backups gives you peace of mind
Get the resultset of scheduled queries delivered right into your Inbox
Run maintenance queries at scheduled intervals using Notification Services
Scheduled Jobs allows you to schedule important jobs like backups, data sync, etc.
SQL Formatter formats SQL for better readability and maintenance
SQL Formatter beautifies your SQL code instantly
SQL Formatter 'pretty prints' your SQL code
Query Profiler helps you identify problem SQL
Query Profiler helps you fine-tune SQL
Query Profiler helps you create the right indexes
Query Profiler analyzes queries and helps you optimize them
Query Profiler reports the exact time spent in each step of query execution
Query Profiler helps you write better SQL
Query Profiler identifies whether indexes are being used effectively
Query Profiler helps you improve overall response time of your application
Create compressed backups and save disk space
Schema Optimizer helps you determine the optimal column types
Schema Optimizer helps you save memory and disk space
Schema Optimizer helps fit more data into memory thereby improving response times
